and.attribute: 22 Bis LamSon St., Ward 2, District Tan Binh

- Developing, implementing and maintaining software projects - Writes design/implementation documentation - Participates in design/code reviews - Communicate and report directly to leader in VN and Canada (chat, e-mail, and document)

* Education/Training Required - Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/IT - Technician’s/Diploma’s Degree in Computer Science/IT can be considered * Required Job Skills -Strong experience with current development language(C/C++, VC++, .NET, Linux...) -Proficiency in C++ or high skill on .Net is preferred - Have good knowledge about OOP, OOD principles; design patterns - Experience in multithreading development -Knowledge about hardware and system, Network Programming, Media Programming (Audio/Video, Codec), Mobile Programming -Years of experience: one more years in program as a priority * Skills/Traits/Abilities: - honest - hard-working - creative - positive thinker (striving for the best) - Excellent communication skills - Proactive (especially with research) - Decision maker - Troubleshooter - Able to work with deadlines - Prioritize/organized *Benefits - Very competitive salary, Social Insurance, Health Insurance, Unemployment Insurance and Others as Vietnamese Labor Code and company Policy - Have a friendly and active working environment with opportunities to be trained and get promotion. - Opportunities to be trained/work abroad. If you are interested in applying for this position, please send us your CV in English together with expected salary and availability date, copies of relevant Certificates and Degrees, Recent photo for faster processing. Thank you!
